org.seedstack.business.api.interfaces.assembler.dsl

Interface MergeAggregateWithRepositoryThenFactoryProvider<A extends AggregateRoot<?>>


  • public interface MergeAggregateWithRepositoryThenFactoryProvider<A extends AggregateRoot<?>>
    Specifies the behavior in the case where the aggregate cannot be loaded from the repository.
    Author:
    pierre.thirouin@ext.mpsa.com (Pierre Thirouin)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      A orFail()
      Returns the aggregate root or throws an AggregateNotFoundException if the aggregate root cannot be loaded from the repository.
      A orFromFactory()
      Returns the aggregate root.

    • Method Detail

      • orFail

        A orFail()
  throws AggregateNotFoundException
        Returns the aggregate root or throws an AggregateNotFoundException if the aggregate root cannot be loaded from the repository.
        Returns:
        the assembled aggregate root
        Throws:
        AggregateNotFoundException - if the aggregate doesn't exist

      • orFromFactory

        A orFromFactory()
        Returns the aggregate root. If the aggregate root cannot be loaded from the repository, it is created from the factory.

        It uses the MatchingFactoryParameter annotation on the DTO to find the factory method parameters.

        Returns:
        the assembled aggregate root
